definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be complete, at an end, finished, accomplished, spent (NH id., Pi.; Ph. [[כלה]]; As. kalû, put and end to, and cease, vanish Dl:HWB 329; late Aram. [[כְּלָא]] cease, perish (not Targum); on root-meaning enclose cf. [[כלא]] and Ba:ZMG 1887, 605)—†

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: be complete, at an end, of a period of time Ge 41:53 (E; opp. III. [[חלל]] Hiph. begin v:Ge 41:54), Je 8:20 (‖[[עבר]]); so of action or event, with emphasis on time Is 10:25, Is 24:13, Ru 2:23, 2Ch 29:28 (opp. [[הֵחֵל]] v:2Ch 29:27), v:2Ch 29:34, Da 12:7 (‖[[קֵץ]] v:Da 12:6, v:Da 12:9);—vid. also

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: be completed, finished, of a work: temple 1Ki 6:38, 1Ch 28:20, 2Ch 8:16 (‖[[שָׁלֵם]]), tabernacle Ex 39:32 (P).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: be accomplished, fulfilled, only of purposed wrath, or predicition of ´[[י]], Ez Eze 5:13 (‖[[כַּלּוֹתִי]] v:b, see

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: be ideally complete, be determined, always in bad sense, plotted, subj. [[הָרָעָה]]: sq. [[מֵעִם]] of agent 1Sa 20:7, also v:1Sa 20:9 (+ [[לָבוֹא עַל]]), + v:1Sa 20:33 (rd. [[כָּֽלְתָה]], for MT [[כָּלָה הִיא]], LXX We Dr Kit Bu); [[הָרָעָה אֶל־אֲדׂנֵינוּ וְעַל־כָּל־בֵּיתוֹ]] ´[[כ]] 1Sa 25:17; sq. [[מֵאֵת]] of agent Es 7:7 (+ [[אֵלָיו]]).

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: be spent, used up (prop. come to an end), of water Ge 21:15 (E), meal 1Ki 17:14, 1Ki 17:16.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: waste away, be exhausted, fail, lit. of fading grass Is 15:6 (‖[[יׇבֵשׁ]], [[לאׁ היה]]), of vintage Is 32:10 (opp. [[בּוֹא]]), of vanishing cloud Job 7:9 (in sim., ‖[[הלך]]); fig. of fleeting days of life v:Job 7:6 (‖[[קלל]]), cf. Ps 102:4 and [[כָּלוּ בְיׇגוֹן חַיַּי]] Ps 31:11, Je 20:18; v. also

definitions.title: 1 a
definitions.body: supr.; of flesh Job 33:21, cf. of vital strength Ps 71:9, [[בָּשָׂר וּשְׁאֵר]] Pr 5:11, ´[[כ]] [[שְׁאֵרִי וּלְבָבִי]] Ps 73:26, subj. [[רוּחִי]] Ps 143:7; once of ´[[י]]'s compassion [[לאׁ־כָלוּ רַחֲמָיו]] La 3:32 (‖[[תמם]], on txt. see VB); esp. of eyes exhausted by weeping La 2:11, strained by looking (fig.) for relief or refreshment, pine, languish La 4:17, Ps 69:4, Job 11:20, Job 17:5, Je 14:6 (of wild asses); sq. [[לְ]] La 4:17 and, in spiritual sense, Ps 119:82, Ps 119:123; similarly (sq. [[לְ]]) of [[נפשׁ]] exhausted by longing Ps 84:3 (‖[[נכסף]]), Ps 119:81, [[כָּלוּ כִלְיׁתַי בְּחֵקִי]] Job 19:27; so also 2Sa 13:29 where rd. [[וַתֵּכֶל רוּחַ הַמֶּלֶח]] (for MT ´[[וַתְּכַל דָּוִד הַמּ]]) and the spirit of the king pined to go forth unto Absalom, cf. LXXL We Klo Dr Kit Bu.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: come to an end, vanish = perish, be destroyed, by ´[[י]]'s judgment Is 1:28 (‖[[שֶׁבֶר]]), Is 16:4 (‖[[אָפֵס]], [[תָּמַם]]), Is 29:20 (‖[[אָפֵס]], [[נִכְרַת]]), Is 31:3 (‖[[כשׁל]], [[נפל]]), [[וּבַחֶרֶב וּבָרָעָב יִכְלוּ]] Je 16:4, cf. Je 44:27 (‖[[תָּמַם]]), Ez Eze 5:12 (‖[[מוּת]], [[נׇפַל]]), Eze 13:14, Mal 3:6, Ps 37:20, Ps 37:20; (‖[[אבד]]), Job 4:9 (‖ id.), Ps 71:13 (‖[[בּוֹשׁ]]); hyperbol., of severe discipline Ps 39:11, Ps 90:7 (‖[[נבהל]]); of prosperity of a people Is 21:16; [[שֵׁבֶט]] [[עֶבְרָתוֹ יִכְלֶה]] Pr 22:8 the rod of his wrath perishes (> Ew al. is accomplished, of God's wrath).—Da 12:7 rd. perh. [[וְכִכְלוֹת יַד נׁפֵץ עַם קׂדֶשׁ]] and when the power of the shatterer of the holy people should come to an end, so Bev after LXX (for difficult MT [[וּכְכַלּוֹת נַפֵּץ יַד־עַם־קׂדֶשׁ]]) †.
